ygData.subject: Re: Lambent breastplate quest peculiarity
ygData.msgSnippet: It s probably a bug.  I finished my lambent arms last night and the same thing happened she said are you missing something 2 times followed by a
ygData.messageBody:
It's probably a bug. I finished my lambent arms last night and the same
thing happened she said are you missing something 2 times followed by a
congratulations. This leads me to believe that she evaluates the items
one at a time.

Treilanin Loreweaver.

On Wed, 5 Jan 2000, Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4 wrote:

> I completed the lambent breastplate quest the other day. When I gave the
> quest components to Cyrissia (sp?), I got the breastplate, faction change
> messages, experience gain message, etc. I then noticed on the next line in
> the text window a message from Cyrissia saying "Aren't you forgetting
> something?". None of the words were bracketed as a key word/phrase. I
> tried replying with variations of "What am I forgetting?" but got no further
> response from her. Was wondering if this was just a bug or if there might
> possibly something else I could have given her?
>
> Galtin of E'ci
> 30 bard
